
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)
get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)

add_executable(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut)
target_compile_options(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)
target_include_directories(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/protobuf_udf
)
target_link_libraries(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  yql-minikql-protobuf_udf
  yt-lib-schema
  providers-yt-common
  udf-service-exception_policy
  library-yql-minikql
  yql-public-udf
  common-schema-mkql
  providers-common-codec
  library-yql-sql
  yql-sql-pg_dummy
  contrib-libs-protobuf
)
target_link_options(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut PRIVATE
  -ldl
  -lrt
  -Wl,--no-as-needed
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
  -lpthread
  -lrt
  -ldl
)
target_proto_messages(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/protobuf_udf/ut/protobuf_ut.proto
)
target_sources(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/protobuf_udf/ut/protobuf_ut.pb.h
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/protobuf_udf/ut/type_builder_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/library/yql/minikql/protobuf_udf/ut/value_builder_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  SMALL
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)
target_allocator(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut
  cpp-malloc-jemalloc
)
target_proto_addincls(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut
  ./
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/apache/orc-format/src/main/proto/orc/proto
  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)

  --cpp_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/
  --cpp_styleguide_out=${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/
)
vcs_info(ydb-library-yql-minikql-protobuf_udf-ut)
